DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study 15 subject complete determine whether acute consumption cranberry juice effect endothelial function . We complete randomize , double blind , placebo control crossover study design investigate effect cranberry juice consumption endothelial function . Participants ( n=40 ) drink 480 ml double strength cranberry juice similar appear taste placebo per day four week . After two week rest period , cross beverage . We examine endothelial function two treatment period . The study provide information chronic vascular effect cranberry juice .
